title: Cleaning Products Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of common household cleaning products, tools, and their proper uses.

questions.question: Which cleaning product should you NEVER mix with bleach due to the risk of producing toxic chlorine gas?
What is a squeegee primarily used for?
options: Removing water and cleaning solution from glass surfaces

questions.question: Which natural household substance is commonly used as a mild abrasive cleaner and deodorizer?
What type of cleaning tool is a chamois?
Which cleaning product is specifically designed to remove hard water deposits and lime scale?
What household item is commonly used as a natural fabric softener in the laundry?
Which cleaning tool has a rubber cup on a handle, used to unclog drains and toilets?
What is the primary purpose of furniture polish?
options: Cleaning and adding shine to wood surfaces

questions.question: Which abrasive cleaning pad, often green, is used for scrubbing tough stains on pots and pans?
What does the term 'antibacterial' mean on a cleaning product label?
options: It is safe for all surfaces
It kills or inhibits the growth of bacteria

questions.question: Which cleaning tool is a long-handled mop with a flat, rectangular head and removable pad?
What is rubbing alcohol (isopropyl alcohol) commonly used for in cleaning?
options: Disinfecting surfaces and removing sticky residue

questions.question: Which type of vacuum cleaner is specifically designed for picking up liquids as well as dry debris?
What is the purpose of a lint roller?
options: Removing lint, pet hair, and fuzz from clothing and upholstery
